OrgName.entry: ABBEYDALE PARK RACKETS AND FITNESS CLUB

Desc.entry: Squash: teams in Yorkshire League (mens and ladies), Sheffield and District League (mens, ladies, veterans and juniors), club box leagues which rotate every 5 weeks, coaching for all levels, structured junior coaching, free tasters/after school clubs. Racketball: box leagues, free taster sessions. Fitness Suite: full range of cardio-vascular and resistance equipment. Also holds classes in aerobics, pilates and circuit training. On-site specialist in sports injury treatment and rehabilitation.
